title: Journal 3
alt: Oh, and, uh, if the Russian government asks, that submarine was always there.
transcript:
[Two women ice-skating outside.]
Ponytail: Wait up!
Danish (wearing Black Hat's Hat): Skate faster![Danish sees cracking ice.]
Crack Crack[Danish on chunk of ice broken off.]
Crack Rumble[Submarine dorsal fin emerging.]
AWOOGA[Black Hat (minus hat) coming out of hatch.]
CREAK
Black Hat: Hi.Black Hat: That's my hat you're wearing.Danish (wearing Black Hat's Hat): So, you found me after all.
Black Hat (out of frame): You didn't make it easy.Black Hat: You saw through me, all right. But not quite well enough.Black Hat: Because if you wanted to stay lost forever, you made one mistake[Black Hat climbing out of hatch.][Black Hat sliding down a sheet of ice.][Black Hat snatches hat from Danish's head as he slides by on the ice.][Black Hat skidding to a stop and putting hat back on his head.]Black Hat: You took my hat.Black Hat: I LIKE my hat.[Black Hat walking away.][Danish left standing.]
